Description:
Model:83JE002LUS


GPU
Intel i7-13650HX, 14C (6P + 8E) / 20T, P-core up to 4.9GHz, E-core up to 3.6GHz, 24MB Intel Smart Cache


Graphics
NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5060 8GB GDDR7, Boost Clock 2497MHz, TGP 100W, 572 AI TOPS

Memory
1x 16GB SO-DIMM DDR5-4800 (+1 slot disponible)

Storage
512GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe 4.0x4 NVMe (+1 slot disponible)

Display
15.6" FHD,  IPS, Anti-Glare, Non-Touch, 100%sRGB, 300 nits, 144Hz

Battery
60Whr

Super Rapid Charge (10-minute charge 0-30% capacity, 30-minute charge for 0-70% capacity, 80-minute charge for 0-100% capacity)

Audio
2x2W speaker system with Nahimic Audio

Camera
1080p FHD webcam with privacy shutter

Ports
1x USB 3.2 Gen 1
2x USB 3.2 Gen 2
1x USB-C® 3.2 Gen 2 (10Gbps, DP 1.4 100W)
1x HDMI® 2.1, up to 8K/60Hz
1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
1x Ethernet (RJ-45)
1x Power connector
Label: Lenovo LOQ 15.6" IPS FHD 144Hz, i7-13650HX, RTX 5060, 16GB, 512GB
